name: Ace Squadron: WWII Conflicts
summary:
A Squadron of World War II war planes are on the runway to take over the skies! Are you ready to lead them Pilot?!

WW2 warplanes: Squad of Heroes is a war plane game in the style and atmosphere of World War 2 era.

You can become the supreme leader of the skies in this thrilling combat flight AAA action game. Unleash the might of your plane's arsenal on enemy war wings and light up the skies with blazing explosions in 3D sky dogfights.

Join players from around the globe in an ultimate multiplayer PvP combat for old style fighters air force domination. Military aeronautics at its finest brings you huge variety of aircrafts and air planes.
